title: Kate Hudson Reveals Why She Called Off Wedding to Matt Bellamy
text: Kate Hudson walks the red carpet while attending God’s Love We Deliver’s 2015 Golden Heart Awards Celebration on Thursday night (October 15) in New York City . The 36-year-old actress was joined at the event by one of the evening’s honorees, Neil Patrick Harris, and designer Michael Kors. She was also seen out and about earlier [...] »
